Optimal force.

std::string& _qName [protected]

double& _optimalForce [protected]

AbstractCoordinate* _q [protected]

Corresponding generalized coordinate to which the generalized force is applied.

AbstractSpeed* _u [protected]

Generalized speed to which the generalized force is applied.

For a generalized force to be applied, it must have both a coordinate and speed.

double* _utmp [protected]

Temporary work array for holding generalized speeds.

Excitation (control 0).
